reviews.review: geiles game
An original masterpiece.

I highly recommend this game to anyone. If your looking for a really good 4 player co-op zombie survival game to play with your friends look no further! This one will keep you entertained for awhile and if this isn't enough for you, you can always check out the second game as well.

Most people would probably say that Left 4 Dead 2 is a better game because it includes 1's maps and 2's maps, but the atmosphere and community of Left 4 Dead 1 seems to be better in my opinion.  The special infected are fairer to fight since there are no BS jockeys and chargers to ruin your day. That's not to say it's not a challenging game.  The tank is a force to be reckoned with; molotovs are not get-out-of-jail free cards like in L4D2.  Overall I think this game is worth a buy even if you have L4D2. 10/10 would get destroyed on Blood Harvest finale again.
Have many more hours on xbox. Was a wonderful experience

good zombies game

Wanted to see if it was as good as everyone said it is, and was not disappointed. There were a few difficulty spikes here and there, and the game did take a couple of cheap shots, which was mostly really jerkish enemy placement. Despite that, it was a very enjoyable and exciting game, from the chilling atmosphere set by the ambiance, to the lovable characters and the great gameplay, this game is well deserving of its acclaim.

》L4D(以下对游戏的名称将沿用此简写)是款和可由1-4人[“可称为幸存者“]参与的多人合作FPS游戏。因为幸运的免疫于让全世界人民变的疯狂的那个病毒，作为一个幸存者，你不得不面对此前对抗病毒失败的结果，那就是需要对抗无穷无尽的受感染人群，还需要时不时的出入疯狂的精神病人堆。

L4D1 is a classic game that everyone should have in their steam library. The game has that replay ability so it's hard to get tired of. If you don't have that much money just buy L4D2 which has this whole game in it plus a whole new set of survivors to play as. Also if you are playing this and you are overwhelmed, run to a corner and just shove, you don’t have a cool down except for multiplayer.

Fast paced game that you can play with your friends. Experience six episodes with your friends. Kill your friends on finale. Leave your friends to die, and most importantly steal your friends med kit.

it's a really fun game i really enjoy it. owned it back on xbox 360 and it was my most played game. the few things i most about this game is the teamwork aspect and how easy it is to screw up[ and get hoards of zombies after you xD the different types of enemies are interesting and it always puts me on edge on what's coming next.

Achei muito Easy, inclusive, jogando no expert com meus amigos, que são horriveis, inclusive, o jogo é muito bom pra quem sabe jogar, quem não so vai morrer e chorar mesmo, mas realmente, muito bom jogo para se jogar com amigos. Ps: Espero que a segunda versão seja mais desafiadora para meu tipo de gamer, espero realmente uma dificuldade acima da que foi apresentada.
Achei realmente fácil, joguei com meus amigos e me diverti muito, entretanto, buscava um verdadeiro desafio através do modo Expert.

Bom jogo de tiro coop em primeira pessoa com zumbis... mas dizem que é inútil comprar esse pois o 2 é praticamente um upgrade geral desse aqui, com tudo e mais um pouco.
Mas tá aí, eu nunca tinha "jogado" nenhum dos dois (só na casa de amigos, e bem pouquinho) e curti bastante a experiência. Ah, mas tem pouca gente online... o 2 deve ter uma comunidade mais ativa.
Resumindo: Recomendo, o jogo é funciona bem e é divertido.

nice game

Многим игра не понравилась из-за однообразного геймплэя и малого выбора оружия, но на самом деле это даёт свою нагнетающую атмосферу, которой нет в портированных компаниях в l4d2. Конечно стоимости как у второй части, эта игра не стоит. Из плюсов по сравнению со второй частью: 1 Меньшее количество неадекватов 2 В общем более менее дружелюбное  комъюнити 3 Более гнетущая атмосфера (кто то называет это скукой :)). Из минусов: 1 Мало игроков на серверах 2 В какой-то степени плюс №3 3 Графон похуже (мне это не мешает). Покупать ли игру, решайте сами, я сам купил игру когда в l4d2 у меня было около 240 часов, а в l4d мне очень даже зашло.
